document_data.name: Mercenaries' Guild of Westgate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mercenaries' Guild of Westgate''' was a mercenary recruitment organization based in [[Westgate]] around [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Membership: The Guild was proud to recruit only from the best merchant families of Westgate.
document_data.Tactics: Usually, the Guild used cavalry attacks, despite their recruits sometimes being too untrained to use them efficiently.
document_data.Contracts: The Guild charged 250 [[gold piece]]s per week for services of 100 men, with more money needed if the employers wanted something more. With the presence of [[Palla]] in the field, they needed to pay double.
document_data.History: The Guild operated exclusively in the [[Western Heartlands]]. They defeated pirates in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], [[orc]]s in the [[Hullack Forest]], and fought together with the Dalefolk against [[Lashan Aumersair]].
